text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @seanhannity @FoxNews Median age of #COVID19 in Florida is 33 yrs! All Americans sacrificed for 5 YEARS in WWII, and you #Covididiots cannot even wear a mask, distance & avoid gatherings for a few months. So self-indulgent. No sense of community or caring for other Americans. 
https://t.co/7sstIqMQwZ
